itemInfo.itemDesc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Coastal Cave, Coastal Cliff, Northern Heidel Quarry, Southern Cienaga, Hexe Stone Wall, and Abandoned Iron Mine. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Iron.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Ferry Cargo Container
item.desc:
A freight chest that can be attached to a Ferry, allowing it to hold heavier cargo.
When 3 or more set items are installed:
Movement Speed +2%

- Can be Installed on: Ferry

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Light Red Plumed Champron
item.desc: Horse helmet decorated with red feather. Study and light.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Wagon Registration: Farm Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Farm Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 14, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Strong Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Strong Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 10, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Fishing Boat Decoration
item.desc:
A decoration that can be attached to a fishing boat. It lowers the chance of breaking trade items.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Trina Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Trina cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has average durability and faster loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 5 different states.
Base Damage: 750
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Lynch Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Lynch cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has more durability and average loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 4 different states.
Base Damage: 1000
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Old Serendia Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble old Serendian cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
Old model has less durability and slower loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 3 different states.
Base Damage: 500
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching deep sea fish. Some fish can only be caught with a harpoon. \n- It requires a Fishing Boat to use.

item.name: Anvil
item.desc: A tool used for Repairing weapons and Defense Gear. It requires knowledge about Self Repairing to be used.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Pure Iron Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Iron Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Maple Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with maple.

item.name: Copper Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with copper.

item.name: Tin Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with tin.

item.name: Ship License: Calpheon Ferry
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Calpheon Ferry> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 10, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 105%, Turn: 105%, Braking: 105%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
